name: HMActionSet
desc: A collection of actions that you trigger as a group.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the action set.

items.name: func updateName(String, completionHandler: HMErrorBlock)
items.desc: Updates the name of the action set.

items.name: var actionSetType: String
items.desc: The type of the action set, such as built-in or user-defined.

items.name: var actions: Set<HMAction>
items.desc: Set of actions in the action set.

items.name: func addAction(HMAction, completionHandler: HMErrorBlock)
items.desc: Adds an action to the action set.

items.name: func removeAction(HMAction, completionHandler: HMErrorBlock)
items.desc: Removes an action from the action set.

items.name: class HMCharacteristicWriteAction
items.desc: An action in an action set that writes a value to a characteristic.

items.name: class HMAction
items.desc: An abstract base class for actions in HomeKit.

items.name: var isExecuting: Bool
items.desc: The execution status of the action set.

items.name: var lastExecutionDate: Date?
items.desc: The last execution date of the action set.
